metadata.title: CVE-2021-35946 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A receiver of a federated share with access to the database with ownCloudversion before 10.8 could update the permissions and therefore elevatetheir own permissions.

criterions.comment: owncloud: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
